title: Garena League Of Legends Skin [SEA League Of Legends]
body: I always have thought riot skins and pax skins and other rare skins etc black alister existed in SEA league of legends but I was pretty upset when I learned that there isn't anyway Riot nor Pax skins on SEA League Of Legends.I feel that Riot and Pax Skins should exist in SEA League of legends if not,why create pictures of those skins that doesn't even exist and no one owes in SEA League Of Legends I find it ridiclous.

replies.body:
Dear kittencute1612,

This is Wayne Lee.  I am responsible for Riot in Taiwan and Southeast Asia.  My colleagues have informed me of your question/concern.  I would like to begin by saying that I am sorry for your frustration.  As a fellow player, I can totally understand how frustrating it can be when you see a skin that you really like but there is no way of getting it.  Unfortunately, there are 5 independent servers in SEA (Vietnam, Philippines, Singapore/Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia) and they all have minor differences in terms of availability of different "rare" skins and they are not always aligned with the availability in other Riot regions (e.g. OCE).  This is because as my colleague has explained earlier, we have a partner in this region (Garena) who publishes League of Legends on our behalf.  As part of our partnership, we entrust them with the power to decide which skin to make available, as well as when and how.  I am sorry I don't have better news for you. 

Cheers,
Wayne
Im sorry but what is SEA?

> [{quoted}](name=Torea2,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=tUiAZ5WW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-22T21:01:46.008+0000)
>
> Im sorry but what is SEA?

South East Asia.
Is it like a different server or something? Or part of Oceania

Different server and platform.
And it is not operated by Riot but from a 3rd party publisher called Garena.

Hey kittencute1612,

yes, that must be frustrating.
Unfortunately from OCE there is little we can do about it. I'll raise it to the SEA manager though.
